articles.title: Europe and Asia, alarmed by COVID variant, tighten borders - Reuters
articles.description: Global authorities reacted with alarm on Friday to a new coronavirus variant detected in South Africa, with the EU, Britain and India among those announcing stricter border controls as scientists sought to determine if the mutation was vaccine-resistant.
